item.title: Manufacturing Computation for Multi-layer Devices
item.description: Manufacturing Computation for Multi-layer Devices Hinge width, laminate thickness, and range of motion The first thing to think about is how the thickness of your laminate will impact and alter the ideal kinematics you have been assuming up to this point.
